hero.title: Reptile Global
hero.description: We're all about getting your reptiles where they need to go safely and comfortably. With worldwide shipping capabilities, we serve North America, Europe, Asia, and beyond. Our climate-controlled transport ensures your reptiles travel stress-free to destinations across the globe.

partners.title: Trusted by Industry Leaders
partners.description: We partner with the world's leading logistics companies to provide you with comprehensive shipping solutions and global coverage.
partners.morePartners: And many more trusted partners worldwide

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Comprehensive logistics solutions tailored to meet your business needs

climateTransport.title: Climate-Controlled Transport
climateTransport.description: Temperature and humidity controlled vehicles ensuring optimal conditions for reptile transportation worldwide.

globalShipping.title: Global Shipping Network
globalShipping.description: Specialized international shipping to North America, Europe, Asia, and other regions with full documentation and compliance.

quarantine.title: Quarantine Facilities
quarantine.description: Certified quarantine and holding facilities meeting international standards for reptile health and safety.

doorToDoor.title: Door-to-Door Service
doorToDoor.description: Complete pickup and delivery service from breeder to destination with expert reptile handling.

breederNetwork.title: Global Breeder Network
breederNetwork.description: Connecting reptile breeders worldwide with international markets through our trusted global network.

cites.title: CITES Documentation
cites.description: Full CITES permit handling and wildlife documentation for legal international reptile trade.

features.title: Why Choose Us
features.description: Experience the difference with our industry-leading capabilities

insurance.description: Comprehensive coverage and expert reptile handling protocols

delivery.title: Safe Delivery
delivery.description: Healthy arrival with full documentation and health certificates

marco.quote: Reptile Global has revolutionized how we ship worldwide. Every animal arrives healthy and stress-free. Truly professional service.

lisa.quote: Reliable shipping from North America to China with perfect documentation. Their climate control systems are top-notch.

johan.quote: Professional handling and fast delivery to Malaysia from the US. Reptile Global understands the needs of live animal transport.

sophie.quote: Excellent service to Korea and other global markets. Full CITES support and healthy arrivals every time.

showcase.title: Our Reptile Operations
showcase.description: Specialized facilities and expert handling for live reptile transport

about.title: About Reptile Global
about.description: With over 5 years of specialized experience in reptile transportation, we've become a leading expert in safe, legal reptile shipping across the globe. Our network connects breeders worldwide with markets in North America, Europe, Asia, and emerging regions.
about.compliance: We're certified by CITES authorities and maintain the highest standards for live animal welfare and international compliance.

cta.title: Ready to Ship Your Reptiles?
cta.description: Connect with global markets through the world's premier reptile transportation specialists.

hero.title: Contact
hero.subtitle: Reptile Global
hero.description: Get in touch with our reptile transportation experts. We're here to help ship your reptiles safely to global markets worldwide.

bios.elena: With 20+ years in veterinary medicine and reptile care, Elena ensures the highest standards in animal welfare.
bios.marcus: Former wildlife transport specialist with expertise in international reptile shipping regulations and logistics.
bios.liWei: Based in Singapore, Li Wei manages our Asian operations and maintains relationships with importers across 12 countries.
bios.sarah: CITES specialist ensuring all shipments meet international wildlife trade regulations and documentation requirements.
